level.heading: PROGRAM SERVICES[COLON] ASSISTED LIVING SERVICES (ยง 29-4240)

level.text: Consistent with the requirements set forth in ยง 44-106.07 assisted living services shall consist of any combination of the following services to meet the resident’s needs as outlined in the written individualized service plan required pursuant to section 4202 of these rules:
Twenty-four (24) hour supervision and oversight to ensure the well-being and safety of residents;
Assistance with activities of daily living and instrumental activities of daily living to meet the scheduled and unscheduled service needs of the residents:
Laundry and housekeeping service not provided by the resident, personal care aide or homemaker aide;

Facilitate access for a resident to appropriate health and social services, including social work, home health agencies, nursing, rehabilitative, hospice, medical, dental, dietary, counseling and psychiatric services; and
Coordinate scheduled transportation to community-based activities.
